*Only works on 𝙜𝙧𝙢𝙨.𝙜𝙖𝙧𝙙𝙚𝙣𝙘𝙞𝙩𝙮.𝙪𝙣𝙞𝙫𝙚𝙧𝙨𝙞𝙩𝙮 website*

QuizGenius is an advanced AI-powered Chrome extension designed to enhance your quiz-taking experience.

🎯 Key Features:
• Real-time AI-powered question analysis
• Smart answer suggestions with high accuracy
• Live progress tracking and statistics
• Clean, modern user interface
• Secure data handling with HTTPS encryption

💡 Perfect For:
• Students taking online assessments
• Self-paced learning
• Practice tests and quizzes
• Exam preparation

🔒 Privacy & Security:
• No personal data storage
• Secure HTTPS encryption
• Temporary session data only
• Transparent data handling

💻 Technical Details:
• Works with Garden City University GRMS
• Requires Chrome version 116 or higher
• Internet connection required
• Real-time AI processing

Note: This tool is designed to assist learning and understanding. Users are encouraged to use it responsibly and in accordance with their institution's policies.

✨ Benefits:
• Save time on practice quizzes
• Get instant feedback
• Track your progress
• Improve understanding through AI analysis

Contact Me: [ *info@QuizGenius.site*]
